item.title: One Pot Taco Pasta
item.description: This One Pot Taco Pasta is a delightful fusion of flavors that brings the fun of taco night to your dinner table in a quick and easy way. Perfect for busy weeknights, this dish is sure to please both kids and adults alike!
item.dc:creator: author_001
item.content:encoded:
â±ï¸ Prep Time: 15 minutes

ğŸ³ Cook Time: 30 minutes

â° Total Time: 45 minutes

ğŸ½ï¸ Servings: 4

ğŸ“Š Difficulty: Easy

ğŸ¥˜ Ingredients

  • 1 pound ground beef
  • 1 packet taco seasoning
  • 8 ounces pasta
  • 1 can diced tomatoes
  • 2 cups beef broth
  • 1 cup shredded cheese
  • 1 cup corn
  • 1 cup black beans
  • 1 tablespoon olive oil

ğŸ‘©â€ğŸ³ Instructions

  1. In a large pot, heat olive oil over medium heat and brown the ground beef.
  2. Add taco seasoning and stir until well combined.
  3. Pour in the diced tomatoes, beef broth, pasta, corn, and black beans.
  4. Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer for about 15 minutes until pasta is cooked.
  5. Stir in shredded cheese until melted and creamy.
